title: EP 161: Self Help You Can Believe In: Interview with Dr. Tim Wilson, Author of Redirect
description: Looking for a self-help book with some meat?  One that won't insult your intelligence with flowery words and hyped up promises and pseudoscience?  Take a look at the book Redirect by psychologist and author Tim Wilson.  Redirect will give you a lot to think about and some new insights into human nature.
